entry.title: Copy of 3M Auto Trizact Hookit Foam Discs P8000 ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 11.99

3M Trizact Abrasives used in paint defect removal and refinement help reduce compounding and buffing time. They consist of precisely-shaped three-dimensional pyramids distributed uniformly over the surface of the disc. As these pyramids wear, fresh, sharp mineral is constantly exposed to the work piece, resulting in faster, more consistent performance cutting throughout the life of the discs. 3M Trizact Discs & Sheets allow you to have more consistent finishes with better cut, finish, and a longer life. Using a 3M Trizact Hookit Foam 1000, 1500, 3000, 5000 and 8000 grade discs will reduce your buffing time and eliminate the need for a wool compounding pad, making the job easier and faster than the traditional process!

Listing for single disc.

entry.title: 3M Auto Sun Gun II Colour Matching Light Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Equipment
Price: 849.99

The 3M™ PPS™ Sun Gun™ II Colour Matching Light Kit offers advantages like helping to choose the correct variant or alternative colour chip and verify coverage and colour match. The Sun Gun can also help with detail to identify post-paint defects such as swirl marks, burn through, sand scratches and dirt nibs, and can assist in clearly identifying damaged areas prior to writing the estimate. The kit can also help to identify pre-paint defects such as pin holes, sand scratches and solvent pop. It delivers long battery run time, a wider, more even light beam, an improved battery charger and a more durable bezel comparison to the legacy model.

entry.title: 3M Auto Quick Release Adapter 5/8" Thread
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Equipment
Price: 63.99

3M™ Quick Release Adual Adapter is designed to quickly connect and disconnect double-sided buffing pads, helping to centre the pad for more effective use. 5/8" thread. Max RPM: 3000.

entry.title: 3M Auto Trizact Clear Coat Sanding Discs
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 38.99

3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Clear Coat Sanding Discs are for use in scuff sanding blend panels before painting, and can be used damp to level minor dust nibs and for light sanding of mismatched orange peel on all automotive paints. These sanding discs can be used with Random Orbital Sanders. 25 discs per box.

entry.title: 3M Auto Hook-It Sanding Disc Pad Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 39.99

3M™ Hookit™ Sanding Disc Pad Kit contains a dust extraction Hookit™ back up pad, constructed on foam. The backup pad has a 5/16-24 INT thread.

Includes 5 adaptors:

  • 1/4-20 EXT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 1/4-20 INT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 1/4-28 EXT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 5/16-24 EXT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 5/16-24 EXT X 6mm-1.0 EXT

entry.title: 3M Auto Hook-It Low Profile Sanding Disc Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Equipment
Price: 24.49

3M HOOKIT LOW PROFILE SANDING DISC PAD 3" X 1/2"
SKU: 20350
Company: 3M

3M™ Hookit™ Low Profile Sanding Disc Pads are firm yet flexible to provide versatility for flat sanding applications and are designed to securely hold on a random orbital sander. Low profile firm density foam and blunt 35 degree tapered edge provide durability and an aggressive cut. Use this disc pad with coarse grades where good leveling is needed. Multi-hole pattern evacuates dust better than 5- or 6-hole products.

entry.title: 3M Auto Green Masking Tape
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 6.99 - 15.99 (2 variants)

3M GREEN MASKING TAPE 3/4"
SKU: 26334
Size: 18 millimeters
Company: 3M

High performance masking tape for automotive refinishing applications. This green coloured tape has excellent conformability, transfer resistance and is resistant to bleed through. This product goes on quickly and easily, sticks at a touch and stays put. Hugs curves and provides outstanding paint lines. Also has better UV resistance than traditional masking tapes. Perfectly balanced to give outstanding masking results.

Specifications:

  • Colour: Green
  • Length: 55 Linear Yard
  • Thickness: 6.6 Milli-inch (mil)
  • Width: 18 mm (3/4 inch)
  • Adhesion to steel: 38oz./in width. Tensile: 25lbs/in. Tape thickness: 6.7 mils. Temp range: 250F(121C) for 30 minutes.

entry.title: 3M Auto Cubitron Hook-It Clean Sanding Abrasive Disc
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 88.99

  • 3" size
  • 120+ grade

Cubitron Hookit™ Clean Sanding Abrasive Discs combine the highest 3M technology for automotive repair. Its long-lasting triangular shaped grain and multi-hole pattern for excellent dust extraction make the disc ideal for paint removal, rough body filler shaping, fine feather-edging or final prep before blending or priming. The 3M™ Hookit™ system makes for quick disc change-outs.

3M™ Perfect-It™ Foam Polishing Pads are high performance, double-sided, black foam polishing pad. It helps to remove compound swirl marks and fine paint surface defects. These polishing pads are intended for use with 3M™ Machine Polishes and 3M™ Quick Connect Adaptor.

entry.title: 3m Auto Wet or Dry Abrasive Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Sanding
Price: 83.99

Durable yet flexible, the 3M™ Wetordry™ Abrasive Sheet levels minor dust nibs, and is great for adjusting mismatched orange peel on all automotive paints. Fast cutting and long lasting, this abrasive has a flexible backing with a consistent scratch pattern. 5.5" x 9".
